column3: “Blue Magoo is actually a cross between Blueberry, Major League Bud, and Afgoo..The original magoo grower used to by my Ommp grower. The original strain comes from Portland, Oregon.”

“Smoked a bowl in the shower while groovin out to some funky jams. Very unique smell and taste, fruity and delicious! Over all an amazing high. I was stimulated, giggly, and happy beyond belief. Helped loads for muscular and bone pain relief in my legs, all aching gone and a great time to boot! I was easily active but no anxiety at all. A comfortable, pain and anxiety free time.”

“Migraine pain 4-5; nausea 6-7 when I medicated round 2200 or so? Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (a must for me). Head high energetic; definitely a daytime med. Body high very nice; just what I needed. Got a kick outta the tight buds & red hairs; high quality for sure. Almost couldn't go to sleep but did manage to pass out round midnight or so. Highly recommend for daytime use...”

“I've suffered from true migraines since I was a child (for over 40 years) and I've recently come to MMJ for relief because I can't stand the prescriptions and I can't have caffeine (which works great for migraines but I'm allergic to). I researched and researched and decided to make Blue Magoo my first try.

When I was younger I smoked a lot for recreation, but I'm way past that, so I'm truly looking for pain relief....”

“Blue Magoo looks and smells outstanding. The description on leafly is spot on, so I do not know what else to add other than to say Blue Magoo leans on the indica side of things. It is also worth noting that I did not get the munchies while medicating and it wasn't overly harsh, which is a welcome change from some of the harsh and heavy indicas I have been coming across lately. Overall 9.5/10. This strain also regular...”

“Strain: Blue Magoo (DJ Short’s Blueberry / Major League Bud [Willy’s Wonder F2] cross -- Hybrid)
THC: 25.68%
CBD: 0.96%
Location found: Slabtown Cannabis Proprietors 
Date purchased: 5.4.16 
Price: $10.00/g
Weight: 1.0g
Method of Consumption: Herb Iron and small bong 
Smell: The Afghani background reigns true over the Blueberry to me. It is a complex and pungent combination that has that morning dew off of a fresh gr...”

“Love its parent, DJ.. But wasn't as good as i expected. Blue Magoo from WAM Oil, good stuff, not as much flavor as expected and the high was shorter lived. Bit disappointed, but will try again. Good for people with anxiety, depression and headaches.”
“This strain has amazing bud structure and crystals. Very fluffy nugs and a good clean smoke ... Heavy on the head....”

“This is by FAR the best Blue Magoo around!! A super strong williams wonder phono it produced red/pink hues on the flowers! SOO DANK!! UGH! This dispensary had quality meds and SUPER NICE people working there! They're mad friendly and always willing to go the extra mile for every patient. They seem to know every patient by name which is amazing!”

“When doing reviews on Leafly I do a broad overview of my feelings on each strain.  A full view of the strain based on a culmination of the many different experiences not broken down by each different percentage or dispensary.  In fact when first putting reviews on this site I would list all the dispensaries (sometimes 9 or 10) at bottom when asked for more details finally realizing they only posted the first one.  Ra...”

“If you're in a lot of pain but still want to be alert and functional, you might want to check this strain out ASAP. Blue Magoo has a great balance between Sativa and Indica properties that really do deliver the best of both worlds--pain relief without that lingering I need a nap" feeling. If you're needing to get work done around the house
column5: or simply just want to enjoy your day pain-free

column3: “Not quite my holy grail" of weed but not far from it. Definitely an exceptional strain that I have the pleasure of growing and smoking my own. In my opinion it is best at 10 weeks then cured for 3.

column1: I also call it "the cancer patients dream"

column2: get hungry (I mean REALLY hungry) no anxiety
column3: happy great smoke with up lifted head and good indica body buzz”"

“I am in love with Blue Magoo. 
It's a beautiful looking flower. 
It immediately lifts any depression, nausea and laziness from my body. You can see colors more vividly, and your mind starts working overtime. 
This is my go to day smoke. It is definitely an upper for me.”

“So sweet and satisfying. Blue Magoo seems to kick in immediately after inhale, and is soooo super effective for remedying nausea and lack of appetite. Plus anxiety attacks, night terrors, soul-draining stress, menstrual cramps, headaches...it's just an excellent strain all around. Plus it's super pretty, with the light blue sparkly crystal frosting. I highly recommend.”

“The first hit and I was in love with this strain! Taste was smooth, fruity and sweet to pine and herbal flavors. I had just two very small hits off a pre roll and the instant happy, relaxed euphoria took me to a lovely place where I no longer noticed the days worth of tension, anxiety and pain that had been bothering me when I got home from work. I enjoyed the flavors of my dinner so much and the interaction with our...”

“Very very tasty! Blueberry/pine smell and taste, very smooth. Buds are like rocks, extremely dense and burn well. Plants have stout and sturdy branches, no problem supporting the buds. Very smelly plant. If you find a clone, buy it! I'm far from a professional grower, but I find my own bmg better than what's on the shelves I have sampled. The high is a good hybrid mix, not overly uplifting or couchlocked... But dont ...”
“Select Strains vape cartridge was 83% THC so only takes a few hits to feel the affect.  Very much a head high, felt more like an Indica.”

“Blue Magoo is a clone only strain  originally from Oregon. It's genetics are Williams Wonder F2 (Major League Bud) X DJ Short's Blueberry.  Mostly purple buds with hints of pink throughout It has great bag appeal. The high from this strain is intense and crippling.”

“If you want to get stupid and slow, but cover up the pain this is your choice! If you get paranoid easily, this seems to be a good one to keep the 'paranoia bugs 'away. It also doesn't feel very heady.. Which is nice because I don't like it when I am forced to think too much while stoned. Also gives you the munchies like you might kill someone if you don't get to eat that piece of candy you forgot about deep inside t...”

“Very very tasty! Blueberry/pine smell and taste, very smooth. Buds are like rocks, extremely dense and burn well. Plants have stout and sturdy branches, no problem supporting the buds. Very smelly plant. If you find a clone, buy it! I'm far from a professional grower, but I find my own bmg better than what's on the shelves I have sampled. The high is a good hybrid mix, not overly uplifting or couchlocked... But dont ...”

“The first hit and I was in love with this strain! Taste was smooth, fruity and sweet to pine and herbal flavors. I enjoyed the flavors of my dinner so much and the interaction with our...”
“Great strain for body pain. Won't couch lock you but does relax you. Highly recommend.”
“Blue Magoo was a pleasant surprise. Got this in Seattle and it has lots of euphoria and energy. Good cuddling strain.”

“Fucking amazing strain! This Blue Magoo is super tasty! It almost tastes like fruity pebbles. It has medium dark green with heavy crystals but Blue Magoo also have very colorful purple surrounding it too. Beautiful strain :) Def recommend, super great and tasty! Worthy of purchase, it makes you feel like uplifted, yet euphoric.”

“Blue Magoo is showing up everywhere in the Seattle/Tacoma area. However, a small dispensary in Tacoma called Tacoma Way" has had Blue Magoo for a few years now. It is incredible. The look is magnificent
column4: the smell is orgasmic to your nostrils and the taste is truly amazing. Its sweet tasting with a heavy eye high but its social and functional if used moderately. A few tokes go a long way with a nice euphoric

column3: “I'm the luckiest mother fucker alive." -Mark Cuban”"
“I have smoke Blue Magoo several time ,but you have go thinking there might be something better Irish Kush close ,well that's life”

“My longtime stoner friend said that her favorite strain was Blue Magoo, so when I saw this on the menu at Glisan Buds I knew I had to go get some!

Blue Magoo smells like blueberry and dirt, like over ripe blueberries fallen and squished on the forest floor after a warm summer rain.  Mmmm tasty!!  This afternoon I started to vape some Blue Magoo, and have been running on even keel all day.

This hybrid strain and ren...”

“Absolutely amazing. Gave me a great tingly feeling immediately, super relaxing. I usually have to smoke a lot to feel much of anything, but despite this strains relatively low THC %, don't let numbers fool you. One hit, and I felt IMMEDIATE relief for both my pain and anxiety. Highly recommend. 

Only major side effect/draw back is severe dry eyes. Just keep some drops on hand Bc this strain is worth it.”
“really. smokable”
“great strain for many reason. helps with depression, insomnia, and pain reduction”

“Best all around bud for an experienced indica heavy hybrid lover. Smokable all day without cognitive difficulties. No paranoia, believe me, I have GAD and panic attacks and does not induce anxiety. Great body buzz, it will have your temples buzzing and legs tingling. A nice but functional head-high is also packed in there. This bud kept me from quitting and going back on prescription meds after bouts with anxiety whe...”
“Amazing strain. Very effective for pain relief, and simultaneously very enjoyable. Great strain right before bed, although it made me giggle like a little girl.”

“This strain is my go2 for pain relief and mellowing out. I can still do stuff, but i'm not as concerned about time. I feel Relaxed like i could take a nap and veg out , but if ya gots stuff to do , then  you can function properly. But this is coming from a daily toker, who can take in high THC levels.. mine from Oregon Medigreen Dispensary  was at a 19% THC . Shout out to Sol Sisters Farms! Holla!”
“One of my favorite strains. Gives a great head high, feeling happy and uplifted. Also you will sleep pretty darn good. Just one puff is all you need which is nice.”

“Just purchased a quarter of trim of this strain from my local dispensary and I'm IN LOVE. I literally took 2 hits from my pipe and I'm buzzed. Smells extremely sweet and leaves no bad taste in your mouth. I recommend this weed to anyone who likes getting high.”

“The first impression us tye dark purple color, then the smell confurms hows good this flower is. A suoer fuity smell is carried over into the taste. It has a smooth smoke that is fruity and earthy making it a joy to consume. The higg is mellow and heady without weighing you down.  I absolutly love this one and will be seeking it out more often.”

column2: like the cherry/berry fruit snacks from Costco

Later in the evening, while winding down, this can help you catch some z's. I will get some more of this as I only pi...”

 I would highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a good standalone for medicinal purposes..  This is a great late evening / before bed indica. Something about this strain specifically didn’t agree with my particular body chemistry and the effect was less relaxing than I had expected.  I felt the need to figh...”

“Grown right this strain is arguably a five star high.”
“Buzzy on my shoulders. Super sticky. Lovely taste. Creamy smoke. I'm on 3 hrs of sleep and I feel amazing and relaxed without being sleepy.”
“it looks like some dro but the fuck it is it's deceiving asf dank no doubt”

“Frosty green nugs with a little bit of purple. Smells fruity with hints of berry. Great mental and physical effects! Does a good job of getting rid of pain! The first half hour after puffing usually is pretty pain free. Most examples I've seen have been between 19-24% THC. Should definitely check it out!”

“Migraine pain 4-5; nausea 7-8 when I medicated round 1830 or so. Takes bout 5-10 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (must or me). Body high allowed me to eat dinner. Head high relaxed me but did slow me down a bit. Twas after work so that's ok. High lasted bout 2 1/2 - 3 hours. This one is more of a 50/50 for me now that my tolerance is so high. I'd highly recommend for after work/evening use...”
“very nice head high.”
“Good Flavor, Taste And my fav Smell. Awesome Strain!!!”

“I have a tendency to get very bad vertigo and tense muscles... earlier today I got suddenly sick, smoked a bowl of Blue Magoo and felt like I was wrapped up in a warm blanket. I was finally able to relax and rest without feeling nauseous. I also fell asleep, which wasn't in my plan, but whatever. I'll take the sleepiness if it gives me that much relief.”

“Bought this pre-rolled on a whim at a tiny lil pot shop while camping in Eastern WA for no other reason than its name. Smoked it and felt so calm and just generally content with life. Don’t have much pain so can’t really say much there but I am prone to headaches and paranoia and I didn’t get either of those with this. Didn’t feel lazy and didn’t get the munchies either which I really liked. 10/10 will buy again.”
“This strain makes me feel so relaxed, but it also makes me super hungry and that's kind of annoying”
“For me this strain is the total package! Unreal terp profile, stunning light green/purple with a thick frost  appearance and unforgettable medicinal qualities. This is a staple in my garden.”

“fantastic strain and high. calm and relaxed. It has a really earthy taste to me but I enjoy it. lets me eat when my illnesses decide I can't eat. The bud its self is compact and tight. I didnt need to use the grinder but it would likely make my like easy if I did.”
“A nice hybrid! It smells sweet, with hints of blueberry. The high is pleasant, it makes your body feel relaxed with a nice uplifting head-high. I like it :)”
“A nice hybrid! It smells sweet, with hints of blueberry. The high is pleasant, it makes your body feel relaxed with a nice uplifting head-high. I like it :)”

“I LOVE the taste of this stuff, I am all about fruity weeds and this really fits that well. It's one of my favorite strains for solo chilling, listening to music, reading, etc cause it doesn't make me feel foggy. It helps with sleep most nights as indicas do, but I don't tend to feel drowsy or heavy.

I have generalized anxiety disorder and this stuff can create a little anxiety or paranoia for me, just a heads up. I...”

“This is my first strain review, as I have been inspired by this little gem of a strain. I got some clones from my neighbor and saw his final product and wasn't too impressed or excited for it. Man was I wrong! Now the whole phynotype philosophy makes beautiful sense to me. I grew two magoos in a top drip hydro system until about week 4 of flower, when my gorilla glues and white widows lifted up their little lady skir...”

“It was okay. A little lower on the THC levels for what I generally prefer. splitting a gram joint with the wife we  get a low body buzz, felt relaxed. Once the buzz wore off we both became pretty tired. 
Recommend it for people looking for a mellow nice high before bed.”

“I recently got some Blue Magoo (95.89% total cannabinoids, 84.7%THC, terpenes 3.69%, Myrcene 1.109%, Caryophyllene 0.643%, Linalool 0.478%) wax cultivated by Happy Cabbage in Oregon. This strain is amazing for my anxiety. As I do a dab, I am immediately hit by a small sativa like head high. Over 5 minutes, tingles travel up my legs and into my head. Once that happens, the sativa like high increases a bit, but then th...”

“If you're looking for a very mild strain, but not at all potent, then this one is for you. As someone who is pretty sensitive to THC, I can't say that I felt much of a high with this one.  A sense of calm, maybe, but overall, disappointed.”
“literally felt the best ever very magical properties in this strain. stress be gone! Great taste very enjoyable. Perhaps a new best friend .”
“Put me in a good mood and helped with focus, but I ended up with a headache. Pressure on my forehead and top of my head. Not the worst thing, but not fun either.”

So watch out!”
“Enjoyed this while chilling at home and watching movies.”

“I find this strain to have a bit of an odd combination of effects. Not terribly similar to those listed. It had a light blueberry taste with hints of a nutty light fuel vapor, somewhat similar to its smell. Higher potency with 1.1% THC & 23.7% THCA. Decent pain relief through entire body via a somewhat subtle, lightly tingly but numbing body rush that poors over the body. Body is relaxed, but somewhat antsy & anxious...”
“one of my fav strains, perfect to get me movin through out the day.”

“Still using Blue Magoo as my go-to medicine. Knocks out my migraine every time. I like that it comes on with a slight sativa kick (very slight for me) and allows me to function well. Then it finishes with a nice indica body relaxation.

I've tried several different versions now, and I've found one that has 2% CBD which is very high for Blue Magoo. It's very nice.

I only vaporize. I like the taste. Just a little frui...”
“Had the most amazing joyous feelings. Definitely an upper for low mood swings”

“very satisfied with this strain.  smoked smooth, not real harsh but hit the mind and body quickly.  Wife and I had four or so rips from the bong and were properly baked.  very talkative but stoney high.  didn't couch as hard as straight indicas, but gave me a big, euphoric body high.”
“Loved it! My body was soft and my mind was in peace! delicious”

“Love the flavor profile, potency is moderate and the smell is delightful. Glad I tried it at least once, but for the price you can usually find something stronger, but for a mild high it does the trick.”
“I absolutely love growing this strain. one of my favs. very strong berry and cotton candy flavor.”
“Wow, very very relaxing. A+”

“great strain not the original has a blueberry but still great. 
great head buzz then puts you to sleep”

“An excellent medical strain that provides a relaxing and mellow high.  Plus great tasting and frosty buds.”
“beautiful buds not to tight not to dense first hit got a head rush this is strong stuff.this is like one hit stuff and zone out while you still have a full bowl”
“incredible strain. great taste and a calming high.”
“Squinty eyes and whacky hi-jinx... Sounds about right. Yes, Mr. Costco-snackbar guy, I want 4 swirl frozen yogurts and a slice of pizza.”
“The Magoo. I adore this strain. Heavy exotic smell of berries, same taste too. Very relaxing, I smoke this one to help me sleep.”
“My favorite strain to date  have lots of pain  this helps with no couch lock”
“This strain is beautiful.  It looks and smells great.  Love the purple color in the bud.  Good after taste.  It is a heavy indica but that's the best part.”
“Would give it 3.5 stars if I could. Very relaxing and mellow high, Sweet, berry flavor. I’m impressed overall. c:”
“Best overall daytime bud. This is all I need.”
“Such a beautiful flower”
“a good strain”
“yum”
“nice smell ,look ,and sweet aroma”
“Awesome strain for that uplifting enlightened sort of high 😀”
“very relaxing and euphoric, you will definitely be happy and hungry!”

“This strain left me with a nice body high but still have energy and the smoke 
was smooth and slightly fruity like Captain Crunchberries lol.”
“This strain is genius. It's a very happy high. A definite favorite.”
“it Vaped pretty smooth. taste flowery. nice buzz but mostly makes me sleepy. crazy dry mouth as well.”
“Love this strain. Need to get some more.”
“I smoked this to relax and get some stuff done before going to bed. It was an awesome high.”
“Clear Headed and focused.”
“This is some pungent greens! We love to smizzy on the river and float in two ways. it was great timing this bud of mine.”

“i was just introduced to this flower today at my local dispensary. luckily i have a great budtender who knew exactly what i was needing. im a veteran with ptsd and im suffering from some sever anxiety and stress. after i tried blue magoo i calmed way down and felt my mind calm down and the stress went away.”
“OH MY GOD WHO PUT THE BLUE KOOL AID IN MY STASH... this...is the best tasting strain ever... and my body is just I feel clean.”
“Nice natural flavor  smoked smooth. Looked, smelled good all around good daytime high.”
“Amazing. Tasty and relaxing ✊🏼”
“Berry with dank morning rain. Very enjoyable”

“Amazing, not the best yielder but such amazing fragrance and flavors, easy to grow also, there is another original phenome out there called dankleberry (Portland area) and it has more of the MLB characteristics and grows the opposite end of the spectrum. Big blue and purple afghani buds. Not to get to far off the topic of what a great strain the blue Magoo is tho, so if you know someone who knows someone and can get ...”
“a beautiful plant to grow. amazing red leaves at end of life. easy to care for. ours got tested at 30% thc from the green houses from the herb center. sunshine grows the best weed.”
“Nice light buzz. No headaches. Smooth from pipe better from bong. After taste is a little blah little smokey. The buzz lets me get creative but I lack the ability to focus.”
“this shit is fire as fuck can't keep it!”
“I like Blue Magoo. Waiting for my clone to mature. Would purchase again.”
“perfect for after work!! chill but doesn't put you down. perfect for chilling after a long day and relaxing with a brew and a game or cool movie. perfect cap for long and productive day!”
“Nothing wrong with this dankkkkk. IDK what else to say at this point haha maybe its time to stop reviewing.”

“I'm growing Blue Magoo now.  I must say, it is one of my favorites to smoke and grow.  The Buds are frosty and smell so fruity.  I'm still a noob, with about 2 years of continuous grow.  I've become more patient, and better able to read the trichomes.  I keep this strain in my garden at all times.”
“Definitely helps with stress”

“Tried this Strain From Regulator Extracts and have to say i am very impressed with what i was looking for in flavor. something smoothe and sweet and this is it! with an added bonus of a total 90.2% THC !!!!”

“I love blue Magoo,does WONDERS for my pain. only complaint, it makes me cough, and with my neck injury and arthritis of the spine, the coughing causes a headache. Blue Magoo, however after a few minutes, calms my headache as well. so no real complaints,just props!!!!”
“my all time favorite!”

“if you think this strain isn't amazing you haven't had a good example of it... there is a phenotype called Dankleberry" I feel the name says it all... much luv to DjShort! always been a huge fan! blueberry
column7: blue moonshine and the list goes on and will hopefully continue!!!”"

column3: “This is the best weed”
“Very melo high”
“Possibly my favorite hybrid strain. Heavy relaxing indica effects without the downside of extreme hunger or paranoia. The strong lavender scent and purple hues make this a great strain to show off.”

“Taste is earthy. Works well with aches and pains. However, the batch I bought was a little too damp. Which weighed at time of purchase. The amount shrunk down after a few days. And no... 😽 I didn't smoke it and forgot that I smoked it.”
“Good. Became very relaxed very quickly.”
“Hi I'm looking for a Blue Magoo clone. Long time fan who would love a opportunity to grow sum  Johnny 303five2five4one8six”
“Description is true to word. Great! A new favorite!”
“This strain hits the spot for me. The smell and taste is unique. Colorful buds. Perfect for day time. Perfect for night time. Perfect strain.”
“pain is at 3/10. uplifted, energized, focused. does keep focus at an extremity”
“One of the strongest smelling buds in years! Really epic, bright and loud. Solid stone.”

“Still using Blue Magoo as my go-to medicine. Knocks out my migraine every time. I like that it comes on with a slight sativa kick (very slight for me) and allows me to function well. Then it finishes with a nice indica body relaxation.

I've tried several different versions now, and I've found one that has 2% CBD which is very high for Blue Magoo. It's very nice.

I only vaporize. I like the taste. Just a little frui...”

“Within moderation, this strain offers a relaxed, happy, dazed high. However, I noticed if I take a few too many puffs on the vaporizer - I become dizzy and paranoid. As I'm prone anxiety, these side effects aren't ideal. 
Additionally, regardless of dosage, I consistently raid the pantry. No snack is left untouched. Nomnomonomnom.”

“I thought I'd make today a Blue Magoo day since I have a lot of it in flower since it was the $25 quarter special last week at the Oregon Grown Gift Shop.  This indica dominant hybrid has always been  fave of mine and after the week I've had it feels so good to just chill.  

I'm taking my black coffee this morning with some fattening hard coconut  and a loose leaf tea ball filled with Blue Magoo steeped for 5 minute...”
“one of my fav strains, perfect to get me movin through out the day.”

“I find this strain to have a bit of an odd combination of effects. Not terribly similar to those listed. It had a light blueberry taste with hints of a nutty light fuel vapor, somewhat similar to its smell. Higher potency with 1.1% THC & 23.7% THCA. Decent pain relief through entire body via a somewhat subtle, lightly tingly but numbing body rush that poors over the body. Body is relaxed, but somewhat antsy & anxious...”
“A nice hybrid! It smells sweet, with hints of blueberry. The high is pleasant, it makes your body feel relaxed with a nice uplifting head-high. I like it :)”

“I have a tendency to get very bad vertigo and tense muscles... earlier today I got suddenly sick, smoked a bowl of Blue Magoo and felt like I was wrapped up in a warm blanket. I was finally able to relax and rest without feeling nauseous. I also fell asleep, which wasn't in my plan, but whatever. I'll take the sleepiness if it gives me that much relief.”

“This is my absolute favorite strain ever as a medical user. It smells amazing, it’s so calming and uplifting, and encourages me to eat. I feel creative and energetic enough to pursue that creativity. I struggle with anxiety, panic disorder, anorexia and chronic depression. Strains typically hit me the opposite of the norm,  too. Blue Magoo for the win!”
“It pains me to have moved back to michigan where this strain is not available. I miss watching this beautiful strain stack up in the mountains of washington”

“Got a joint spliff from Alpha in NE Salem, Oregon. I sensed an inactive chemical, searched, this strain had a pesticide residue as of Spring 2017. Great high nonetheless. Far shot better than pharmaceuticals. No idea what farm the strain with the pesticide came from, but this strain came from Sol Sisters in August 2018. Hey, you, quit the pesticide and get some damn praying mantises or something! -_-”
“This is my favorite for pain. When you can find it.”

“Upon first greeting the Bluest of Magoo’s, I noticed the finest of phenotypes; dense buds coupled with tight orange pistils and an earthy green complexion. The smell is very earthy with subtle floral notes. 

Mrs.Magoo was consumed using my favorite method; cbd blunt wraps. Post-inhalation reminded me of freshly cut grass combined with light fruity undertones, which is appreciated when considering the aftertaste. 

E...”

“It's really chill. It makes your body feel relaxed, like you want to just let all your muscles go. Unfortunately, I can't, my back is in a constant state of tension - but this helps. It's heady, too, which is nice. And apparently I can focus enough to write a review. It does make you kind of sleepy but if you have a high tolerance you might fight it off.”

“Beautiful bag appeal, unprecedented terpenes that will make your mouth water. A great indica dominate strain with a set of very heavy sativa effects. Great morning smoke,but still get the medicinal benefits of a strong indica. Also the genetics are of djshortblueberry x williams wonder the review stating it's crossed with afgoo" etc. is somewhat confusing i think what they did not know is "williams wonder" has the a...”"

“very fait but pleasant scent 
even better flavor with an outstanding berry taste as well as boggy, dizzy, euphoric effects”

“Perhaps the OZ I got was too fresh, as it was harvested two months ago, it seems to hit hard at first and then tapper off. The initial hit can be insane, but it doesn't carry you on like other strains do. The flavor is nice and hits smooth.”
“Loved it! My body was soft and my mind was in peace! delicious”

“Holy cow what a creeper high. i felt like someone anxji vggü kk qjuqydwd7jj hi jjjj
see. I just feel asleep!
but it felt it immediately after dabbing”
“Enjoyed this while chilling at home and watching movies.”
“Put me in a good mood and helped with focus, but I ended up with a headache. Pressure on my forehead and top of my head. Not the worst thing, but not fun either.”

“I recently got some Blue Magoo (95.89% total cannabinoids, 84.7%THC, terpenes 3.69%, Myrcene 1.109%, Caryophyllene 0.643%, Linalool 0.478%) wax cultivated by Happy Cabbage in Oregon. This strain is amazing for my anxiety. As I do a dab, I am immediately hit by a small sativa like head high. Over 5 minutes, tingles travel up my legs and into my head. Once that happens, the sativa like high increases a bit, but then th...”

“fantastic strain and high. calm and relaxed. It has a really earthy taste to me but I enjoy it. lets me eat when my illnesses decide I can't eat. The bud its self is compact and tight. I didnt need to use the grinder but it would likely make my like easy if I did.”
“For me this strain is the total package! Unreal terp profile, stunning light green/purple with a thick frost  appearance and unforgettable medicinal qualities. This is a staple in my garden.”
“This strain makes me feel so relaxed, but it also makes me super hungry and that's kind of annoying”

“Bought this pre-rolled on a whim at a tiny lil pot shop while camping in Eastern WA for no other reason than its name. Smoked it and felt so calm and just generally content with life. Don’t have much pain so can’t really say much there but I am prone to headaches and paranoia and I didn’t get either of those with this. Didn’t feel lazy and didn’t get the munchies either which I really liked. 10/10 will buy again.”
“Good Flavor, Taste And my fav Smell. Awesome Strain!!!”
“very nice head high.”

“Migraine pain 4-5; nausea 7-8 when I medicated round 1830 or so. Takes bout 5-10 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (must or me). Body high allowed me to eat dinner. Head high relaxed me but did slow me down a bit. Twas after work so that's ok. High lasted bout 2 1/2 - 3 hours. This one is more of a 50/50 for me now that my tolerance is so high. I'd highly recommend for after work/evening use...”

“Frosty green nugs with a little bit of purple. Smells fruity with hints of berry. Great mental and physical effects! Does a good job of getting rid of pain! The first half hour after puffing usually is pretty pain free. Most examples I've seen have been between 19-24% THC. Should definitely check it out!”
“it looks like some dro but the fuck it is it's deceiving asf dank no doubt”
“Buzzy on my shoulders. Super sticky. Lovely taste. Creamy smoke. I'm on 3 hrs of sleep and I feel amazing and relaxed without being sleepy.”
“Grown right this strain is arguably a five star high.”
“Smooth hits, even when rolled in a joint. Very tasty. It is a hybrid that feels more like indica.”

“This stuff hits the spot for me. If I could only have one strain the rest of my life, this would be it. Taste and smell are very unique, looks pretty too. Colorful buds. Perfect for morning, day and night. Perfect strain.”
“Top shelf in every way. Taste like berry to me.”
“Very pleasant flavor of pronounced blueberry and honey. Mild, mostly indica effect.”
“I love it!”
“Not a bad hybrid that leans on the Indica side.  It will relax you nicely, but may require extra herb for experienced smokers.   Kind of a plain earthy taste via vaping.”

“Amazing, probably my favorite strain to date. First of all it's delicious, bursting with blueberry flavor but not at all harsh. It's a really smooth, clean smoke. Giggly, relaxed, but still really energetic. 

I've also gotten a recent cross between blue magoo and super silver haze which is even better. You can find it at Serra in Portland OR. And that is my new favorite strain but not yet on leafly. It's all that yo...”

“Love this strain! Super sticky - covered in trichomes. A little goes a long way...A few hits and I'm good to go. Any more than that and the indica portion takes over and I'm off to dreamland. Great well balanced strain. Will definitely get again!”
“This stuff was super terpy, also leaves a wonderful aftertaste in your mouth and nose, this beautiful strain deserves a clean smoking utensil to fully appreciate”
“Not a bad strain. Not one I would seek out, but still not bad.”
“Very euphoric high, high-energy, and tastes delicious!”

“Very strong body and mind relaxation. Taste and flavor is amazing. Very refreshing and crisp citrus and lavender flavor. Not skunk at all. Dry mouth but didn't really feel the munchies. Would make a great post-workout strain.”

“Just a strong fruity smell with a hint of woody pine scent.
Kicks in right away made me feel at ease and suddenly felt
focused and talkitive.
Overall it's amazing for a productive day.”
“Great indica dominant strain that doesn't make me anxious. Very similar to my favorite indica strain called Mendo Breath. I'd grow this in my backyard.”
“Most amazing strain. BEAUTIFUL PRODUCT, and amazing high.  I am head over heels for this ganja.”
“Our next dog will be a corgi named Tina”

“very satisfied with this strain.  smoked smooth, not real harsh but hit the mind and body quickly.  Wife and I had four or so rips from the bong and were properly baked.  very talkative but stoney high.  didn't couch as hard as straight indicas, but gave me a big, euphoric body high.”
“Nice first creative,  then calming effects.  I have to moderate use to not want too much creativity so I want sleep instead.”
“Really helps me get relaxed for bed. love the taste and smoke if this flower.”
“Had the most amazing joyous feelings. Definitely an upper for low mood swings”
“Absolutely love this stuff,blue magoo is where it's at. I love the berry flavor and the abundance of crystals, just don't expect to get much done after smoking this 😜”
“Excellent and affordable. Smells great.”
“literally felt the best ever very magical properties in this strain. stress be gone! Great taste very enjoyable. Perhaps a new best friend .”

“If you're looking for a very mild strain, but not at all potent, then this one is for you. As someone who is pretty sensitive to THC, I can't say that I felt much of a high with this one.  A sense of calm, maybe, but overall, disappointed.”

“It was okay. A little lower on the THC levels for what I generally prefer. splitting a gram joint with the wife we  get a low body buzz, felt relaxed. Once the buzz wore off we both became pretty tired. 
Recommend it for people looking for a mellow nice high before bed.”

“This is my first strain review, as I have been inspired by this little gem of a strain. I got some clones from my neighbor and saw his final product and wasn't too impressed or excited for it. Man was I wrong! Now the whole phynotype philosophy makes beautiful sense to me. I grew two magoos in a top drip hydro system until about week 4 of flower, when my gorilla glues and white widows lifted up their little lady skir...”

“I LOVE the taste of this stuff, I am all about fruity weeds and this really fits that well. It's one of my favorite strains for solo chilling, listening to music, reading, etc cause it doesn't make me feel foggy. It helps with sleep most nights as indicas do, but I don't tend to feel drowsy or heavy.

I have generalized anxiety disorder and this stuff can create a little anxiety or paranoia for me, just a heads up. I...”
“Great uplifting sativa dominate strain. It's great as far as the high and effects go. Description is true to word!”

“Migraine pain 4-5; nausea 6-7 when I medicated round 1830 or so. Takes bout 5-10 in to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (absolute must for me). Body high allowed me to eat dinner. Head high strong but not overwhelming. A lot sleepier dis time but maybe I'm underslept. High still strong @ 2030. Now I go to bed, nite nite!”
“This strain is very chill and relaxing. Anytime smoke. But when it's time for bed this is good too. Stay up my friends”
“the description fits this flower perfectly.  I typically lean towards sativa, sativa dominant hybrids, but this is a favorite as well.”
“By far my favorite strand! It has a sweet fruity flavor to it and its a nice combination of relaxation and euphoria.”

“Indica and it's amazing and gets the job done love the flavor and all the side effects!! And avabile one the budget shelf love that many amazing way they always allow us to have good and effective product,and it's adfforable .”
“Fixing all my problems right now, gently behind the eyes. In a good mood. Tastes sweet to me. It's pretty good.”
“I love this shit. nuff said”
“one of my favorites”
“best giggles ever”

“This one is remarkable. I was immediately impressed. Not only did it knock out my pain surprisingly well. Even better than such excellent body pain combatants god bud &a the black ...this hybrid had a different effect on me. I felt uplifted and motivated . The better than average pain relief must be due to blue magoo indica parents. I deem this one appropriate for daytime use with pain &fatigue. However use your own ...”

“Love the high but not good for people with restless legs or spinal cord diseases !!!!
I like the happy, depression and stress reliever 😊”

“Super tasty, oddly enough it reminds me of the scent used for hello kitty candies. pain was a 7 prior to lighting up, now about 30 minutes in I am cruising at a sweet and elusive 4 and I am thoroughly enjoying my dinner without wanting to eat the wallpaper instead of being super nauseated by pain”
“Very nice strain. Helped my headache. Good if you want the giggles:) not good for production haha weeeeee🐬”
“The Blue Magoo is definitely Stuff Stoners Like. Tasty, smells great, and has a fantastic buzz. Be easy if you aren't a highly tolerant smoker, as this one packs a punch.”

“I like the flavor of this one, It's a nice and flowery draw with some pleasant berry undertones. The indica-dominant effect hits me first for sure, but does not do well for my pain. The smell is a deep berry-grape, and Blue Magoo is sure to please many patients' needs.”

“Highly recommend for pain and nausea. Great strain for unwinding after a stressful day, very relaxing, no anxiety/paranoia.  One of my go to strains if i just want to relax on the couch and binge watch some netflix.”
“First time user....anxiety level is already down!”
“Berry tasty!”
“We like it”

“This strain is  a great looking strain, the frosty buds just look amazing. But they didnt quite live up to there look. It was forsurely some good bud but not as good as it looks. Now with that said, the high was very enjoyable I just wanted to keep talking with my friends and oh man did I some chips! Overall it was forsurely some good bud just looks may trick you! So watch out!”

“Excellent hybrid. The smell is beautiful right off the bat, super fruity and pungent. It's relaxing without being too sedating. I feel motivated to do things but not overwhelmed with racing thoughts. This is a hybrid I'll definitely come back to!”

“Acquired a premium harvest of this strain, 25.5% THC, 1.34 CBD from Highway 420 at a killer deal. LOVE it. Can't wait to get my hands on a clone. Great for tension, anxiety,  and depression related symptoms. Melted the knots in my shoulders I had all day. Also nice for in the morning with a cup of coffee to get the brain fired up and ready to tackle yhe day.”
“interesting flavor.”

“tastes and smells good, while both are kinda mild despite. high is really nice, above average body high. makes the limbs feel numb and a slight head high on the onset. only thing keeping blue magoo from being a 5 star strain in my book is it really just isn't as potent as quite a few other indica dominant hybrids. at least not any blue magoo i have had. i can see this being very good for medical patients however.”

“if anyone has trouble sleeping. fuck a over the counter sleep aid. all you need is blue Magoo.I'm one out of the millions who has a real tuff time shutting down my brain to fall asleep. this shit is one that works well with my chemistry. thank you emerald leaves for having the top shelf Magoo at a good price and thank this wonderful plant for the zzzzz's”
“can never go wrong with this one! good sunday couch strain”
“Good flavor a bit blue and musky.  Euphoric at first then the high settles into a functional balanced buzz.”
“great berry taste and good feeling. Pretty frosty and beautiful red hairs.”

“Wow.  Solid weed.  Comes on strong, stays fairly intense, although in a mellow way.  Stoney, like all the Afghani hybrids but without some of the heaviness you get from, say, Afgoo.  Smells like a field of berries in bloom; looks are grade A nug porn.  Very frosty.  Also has a nice arousal quality.  It does have a bit of dizziness to it, and after three hours or so, it becomes a terrific sleep aid!”
“Best hydro grown flower I've had in years. Smellef like berries in the bag and tasted smooth and fruity.”
“I really liked this strain for my day time. I was able to function and even eat.”
“Made me giggly with a very noticeable headkick and a deep relaxation. Great hybrid.”
“just hit the bammer with this bud wow i feel GREAT!!! i definitley recommend:-)”

“The Blue Magoo from Forbidden Farms is FIRE!!!!

No, I mean it's literally on fire right now, in my bowl. This is some good ass weed. Fire INA HOLE!”
“Made me very hungry. The high had me forgetting conversations that I had 2 min ago, kinda dizzy, very nice head high. The exhale tastes of blueberries so that's a big plus”
